topic.title: Why are you using Zeronet?
topic.body: What are the set of goals you seek to accomplish using the platform?

1581540627_16aoHyKbwpvBmgCtNqX1tW9N5bvXG.body: There is not coming back from this really. At least we got Brexit done.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:

1582025950_12zcNM3BD6QwkonPrnCdbWBnGzu9b.body:
Because it's the default choice and the entry point for all normies. The general majority does care a little about privacy, but not nearly enough to take action and seek alternatives off of Facebook/Instagram.

I like deepnet websites, but they seem like only fringe voices make themselves heard and lead the majority of conversations.

1579853774_1GDtf6kkYiCtruw42QmAeaHG1HsrW.body:
You should archive the links either on Zeronet or IPFS because the truth is not likely to stay online for long.
https://github.com/ipfs-shipyard/ipfs-companion

1581933903_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4Ae.body:
There are actually two forms of escapism: self-suppression and self-expansion. Self-suppression is running away from unpleasant thoughts, perceptions and emotions; self-expansion is actively seeking new skills, stronger relationships and positive experiences. 
The difference between these two is comparable to the difference between saying, "Everything sucks, so I'm going to go play games," versus "Life is better when I have time to play games."

1582788975_19NNH1RF6TRJUjp1qpT7Ri6opWw5y.body:
The people that have been de-platformed by conventional social media need a place to vent their worldview. That's a primary reason the seek privacy-conscious and difficult to silence means such as *chans and onion forums. 
ZN should implement a blacklist, or a shadowban system to help them keep their ignorant worldview to themselves.

1582577947_1DnpB2yFpVwyhA29h2rRsifGVEC1s.body: With 2% mortality rate, you should be more concerned with good hygiene practices and avoiding mass gatherings. Be smart about it and try to focus on the facts, instead of other peoples' opinions.

1583371743_18YbbFYMzM2PLZwPLddxGqRsjbBFH.body: Change is constant, adapt or die.
